post:
Hello all PrimaryVPS customers!

Have you been having downtime issues with PrimaryVPS as of late?
Has your VPS been down just as much or more than it has been up?
Are you fed up with PrimaryVPS?

Then come to us..
TrawlHost is offering a PrimaryVPS refugee sale.

You can get the same plan you had at PrimaryVPS with us for the exact same price! This time there will be 0 unplanned downtime. We'll throw in an extra 64 MB free RAM for plans 1 and 2 and an extra 128 MB RAM for plans 3, 4, and 5.


Order URL: http://www.trawlhost.com/whmcs/order.php?step=2&pid=21
Just click on the plan you had for an addon.

You are welcome to open a ticket at any time if you would like at http://www.trawlhost.com/whmcs.

PrimaryVPS's plans (you can get) are here: http://www.primaryvps.com/vps/index.htm

VPS's will be hosted on Pentium D 2.8 GHz or better with minimum 4 GB server-grade DDR2 RAM. They will be in our private rack at FDCServers. 99.9% uptime the last 2 months.

What is Allowed/Not allowed
Legal Adult Content is fine.
Anything else is fine as long as it is legal.
IRC is allowed.
